title: Please fix this bug
content: I've been noticing lens flare on the images taken on my phone Which is very disappointing and irritating. I've discovered that I get big green or yellow dot on my camera screen as well as in the final image in the night as well as in the day times.When a light source is in the picture there has been reflecting object of the light source formed or  be like ufo shape formed in the image.its very scary.please fix this issue.
